name: sturdy

effect.scarlet_violet: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.the_teal_mask: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.legends_za: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.

short_effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead. Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The Pok√©mon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.
